title: Citi CEO Vikram Pandit Rings NYSE Opening Bell In Honor of 200th Anniversary
summary: Citi CEO Vikram Pandit was interviewed this morning on CNBC's Squawk on the Street, where he discussed Citi's 200th anniversary-- celebrated this past Saturday, June 16th --the situation in Greece/Europe, and the state of the U.S. economic recovery. The interview followed CEO Pandit ringing the opening bell at the New York Stock Exchange in celebration of Citi's 200th anniversary.
